name: The Chess Board
description: Find the correct pieces and their positions on the chess board to solve the puzzle.

hints.name: First Hint
hints.text:
It seems like there are multiple ways to find a solution.
Do not only look at the text.
What else can you see on the paper?

hints.name: Second Hint
hints.text:
The chess pieces needed are a knight(horse) and a rook(tower).
You should also pay attention to the bold words in the riddle.
One hides only the letter the other one does hide the whole position

hints.name: Third Hint
hints.text:
Look at both bold words in the riddle.
One you have to see what it sounds like when you say it out loud.
For the other one look at the first Letter and see if you can find a number in the following lines.
Also pay attention to the box the symbols are in.
Remember there are multiple ways to find the solution.

hints.name: Solution
hints.text: White Knight F6, Black Rook B4
